name: enterprise-admin_remove-pre-receive-hook-enforcement-for-repo
description:
Deletes any overridden enforcement on this repository for the specified hook.

Responds with effective values inherited from owner and/or global level.

owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

pre_receive_hook_id.description: The unique identifier of the pre-receive hook.
